episodes.title: The Russian House
episodes.plot: The escape of a Russian POW sets off a chain of events that leads to murder and rekindles a conflict between Foyle and his former superior.

episodes.title: Killing Time
episodes.plot: Foyle goes head to head against the might of the US army when a local girl is found murdered and the finger of suspicion points to a black GI at the US military base.

episodes.title: The Hide
episodes.plot: Foyle battles to save a young man accused of high treason from the executioner's noose in a case that will shatter his personal world to the core.
